Html:
I have written a program using the HtmlAgilityPack v1.4.0.0 .dll, and it works great on my system.  I created a setup project so I could distribute the program to co-workers, and that also works fine on my machine.  The install appears to work on a co-worker's system as well, but he is getting an error ("Could not load file or assembly HtmlAgilityPack Version=1.4.0.0") when he executes the program.

I am using VS2010 under Windows 7.  He is using Windows XP.  Does anyone have any suggestions?
